messages.title: The Party you can TRUST
messages.content: VOTE UKIP The Party you can TRUST

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Review the Council runway extension plans. Stop over-development in green belt areas. Oppose Navitus Bay offshore wind farm project. Resist 3rd party policing.
Reduce NHS pressures on A&E and GP services. Save the Green Belt land. Reduce foreign aid. Veterans to be treated with fairness.

issues.brexitEurope: After leaving the EU: Vote to retake seat at WTO; Limit foreign fishing fleet; Regain control over agriculture policy; New UK-owned satellite system; Free from EU court rulings.
issues.education: 250million per quarter from EU savings to be spent on schools.
issues.environment: Save the Green Belt land. Oppose the Navitus Bay offshore wind farm project.
issues.health: Reduce NHS pressures on A&E and GP services.
issues.immigration: One in One out immigration. Regain border controls post Brexit.
issues.socialWelfare: Veterans to be treated with fairness.

housing.content: Stop over-development in green belt areas.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Do not trust the Tories. Voters have lost trust as seen in the 2016 referendum and 2017 by-election.
